title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
body: <p>I stumbled upon one of <a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0367594/" title="Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (2005)">Tim Burton's upcoming movies on IMDB today</a>.  I'm guessing that its a remake of the classic <a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0067992/" title="Willy Wonka &amp; the Chocolate Factory (1971)">Willy Wonka &amp; the Chocolate Factory</a>.  I can't picture Johnny Depp as Wonka, Gene Wilder was just too perfect for the role IMO.</p><p>Another thing that I discovered was that <a href="http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0197354/" title="Elizabeth Daily">Dottie (from Pee Wee's Big Adventure) is Buttercup (the Powerpuff Girl)</a>.  IMDB is amazing.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
